panels.title: Percentage of connections out of the total.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid, query, calls
FROM pg_stat_statements
WHERE query NOT LIKE '%CREATE%'
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT queryid,query, mean_exec_time
FROM pg_stat_statements
WHERE query NOT LIKE '%CREATE%'
ORDER BY mean_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 10;
